datacube.search.share.abstracts

Class AbstractBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • datacube.search.share.abstracts.AbstractBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSearch2D, AbstractSearch3D

    public abstract class AbstractBase
extends java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
    This is a base class that shares searched result among search units
    Author:
    btdiem
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractBase() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getResult() 
      void reset()
      This method should be called when a search process starts
      Because found is static variable and it is shared among Threads (Task)
      So when a search process is created, call this method to initialize the original value
      void updateResult(boolean isFound)
      If a word in the IDictionary is found by one task, update found variable and stop all the other search process to start a new search process with a new word
      In case @param isFound is true, there is an exception CancellationException thrown because ForkJoinPool is shutdown when threads are running

      • Methods inherited from class java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction

        getRawResult

      • Methods inherited from class java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask

        adapt, adapt, adapt, cancel, complete, completeExceptionally, fork, get, get, getException, getPool, getQueuedTaskCount, getSurplusQueuedTaskCount, helpQuiesce, inForkJoinPool, invoke, invokeAll, invokeAll, invokeAll, isCancelled, isCompletedAbnormally, isCompletedNormally, isDone, join, quietlyInvoke, quietlyJoin, reinitialize, tryUnfork

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractBase

        public AbstractBase()

    • Method Detail

      • getResult

        public boolean getResult()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method should be called when a search process starts
        Because found is static variable and it is shared among Threads (Task)
        So when a search process is created, call this method to initialize the original value

      • updateResult

        public void updateResult(boolean isFound)
        If a word in the IDictionary is found by one task, update found variable and stop all the other search process to start a new search process with a new word
        In case @param isFound is true, there is an exception CancellationException thrown because ForkJoinPool is shutdown when threads are running
        Parameters:
        isFound - The value returned for each search unit
